name: Vacation Tracker App
description: MCP configuration for fixing remaining issues in the Vacation Tracker application and adding Google Calendar sync capability

methods.description: Get all vacations for the current user

critical_issues.name: date_calculation_issues
critical_issues.description: Incorrect calculation of adjacent weekends and holidays

tasks.description: Fix calculation of adjacent weekend days
tasks.implementation_details: Update the logic to correctly count both Saturday and Sunday when a vacation is adjacent to a weekend

tasks.description: Fix date formatting issues in the dashboard
tasks.implementation_details: Update formatDateRange function to handle different date formats and display dates correctly

tasks.description: Fix holiday dates display in vacation summary
tasks.implementation_details: Ensure holiday dates are displayed correctly without offset issues

critical_issues.name: holiday_date_offset_bug_persistent
critical_issues.description: Holiday dates are still showing one day behind (e.g., Canada Day showing as June 30th instead of July 1st)

tasks.description: Properly fix the date calculation for holidays
tasks.implementation_details: Identify and fix the persistent date offset issue in the holiday calculation logic

missing_features.name: enhanced_vacation_summary
missing_features.description: Improve vacation summary with detailed time off information

tasks.description: Enhance vacation summary to show detailed time off including weekends/holidays
tasks.implementation_details: Update VacationSummary component to show total days off including weekends/holidays and detect adjacent days off (long weekends)

tasks.description: Add informative message about extended time off when vacation connects to weekends or holidays
tasks.implementation_details: Calculate and display total consecutive days off including adjacent weekends and holidays

missing_features.name: improved_calendar_interaction
missing_features.description: Make calendar more interactive with holiday selection

tasks.description: Allow users to select holidays in the calendar
tasks.implementation_details: Update calendar to highlight holidays and allow them to be included in vacation selection, automatically calculating working days correctly

missing_features.name: google_calendar_sync
missing_features.description: Integrate Google Calendar sync for vacation bookings with two-way updates, error handling, and user control

tasks.description: Add a new field 'googleEventId' to the VacationBooking model for tracking Google Calendar event IDs
tasks.implementation_details: Update the Prisma schema to include a field for storing the associated Google Calendar event ID; run migration.

tasks.description: Update OAuth configuration to include Google Calendar scopes
tasks.implementation_details: Add 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/calendar' to the Google OAuth scopes in the authentication configuration and NextAuth settings.

tasks.description: Implement API calls to create and update Google Calendar events on vacation booking creation and update
tasks.implementation_details: On creation or update of a vacation booking, call the Google Calendar API to create or update the corresponding event; store/update the googleEventId accordingly; implement real-time sync.

tasks.description: Implement deletion of Google Calendar event when a vacation booking is deleted
tasks.implementation_details: On deletion of a vacation booking, call the Google Calendar API to delete the associated event using googleEventId.

tasks.description: Implement retry mechanism for Google Calendar API calls and notify user if sync fails after several attempts
tasks.implementation_details: Use a retry strategy for API calls (e.g., 3 retries) and display an error message or notification in the app if syncing fails, prompting manual intervention.

tasks.description: Add user settings options for controlling calendar sync behavior
tasks.implementation_details: Provide options for auto-sync, manual add, or disabling sync; update UI and backend to respect these preferences.

tasks.description: Write integration tests for Google Calendar sync functionality
tasks.implementation_details: Ensure that create, update, and delete actions on vacation bookings correctly reflect in Google Calendar, and error handling works as expected.

holiday_date_fix_permanent.description: Permanently fix holiday date offset issue
holiday_date_fix_permanent.implementation: Ensure all holiday dates are displayed correctly across the application

date_display_fixes.implementation: Ensure all dates are displayed consistently and correctly across the application, including holiday dates and date ranges

updates.description: For multiple day bookings with a half-day, which specific day is the half-day
Stores the Google Calendar event ID for syncing vacation booking events
User preference for which day the week starts (sunday or monday)
